metadata.title: USN-6674-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Seokchan Yoon discovered that the Django Truncator function incorrectly handled very long HTML input. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Django to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6674-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 3:4.2.4-1ubuntu2.2 python-django-doc - 3:4.2.4-1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
